channel.title: Any singers on here?
channel.description:
hi guys!
so i have been producing hardstyle music for over a year now, but all my tracks are without any vocals. So i wanna do a track with vocals, I've already wrote down some vocals but actually looking for someone who can do these vocals, i dont have a good mic so yea the quality isn't that good than :/ thats why im looking for someone.
so if someone is interested to do this, feel free to hit me up or pm me! (if you know someone who can do this you may also pm me his/her skype name) I know my english grammar isn't that good so dont start replying about it, thanks :)
Thanks for reading!

item.title: Any singers on here?
item.dc:creator: @get_a_life1 get_a_life
item.description:
@get_a_life1 wrote:

thanks for the comments guys!

but im more looking for someone who can do a little text!

Read full topic
